Release notes

Version 0.2.1 :small:`(2025-12-19)`

Changes:

- Move test directory outside of package code directory.

Version 0.2.0 :small:`(2025-03-12)`

Changes:

- Adapt command line interface to filter cells by default.
- Use cython to improve performance.

Initial release.
